idea: HCS is in the business of Managing and Sustaining Hospital Growth. www.healthcareconsultingservices.in

idea: Space Geeks is a young start-up working in the domain of Space and allied areas. It is a group of young researchers who have come together to work in the field of Space, the ongoing 4th Industrial Revolution. Space Geeks aims to generate a passion for Space and aspires to connect everyone to Space by contributing in Space Education and Space Technology to generate socio-economic benefits.
name: Space Geeks

idea:

We develop & design Website & Mobile Application, besides this we are involved in multiple IT products.
name: Digiliyo Technologies

idea: BeatCurry is a digital platform Imagined and Made in India. A start-up that will inspire generations of talent in the space of music. The foundation of BeatCurry shall be Technology & innovation, Talent Engagement, bringing to life the rare forms of art, talents and music, reaching out to farfetched artists and presenting their art to the world and engaging with audience and enhance their music experience. The effort will be to bring the priceless music at no price. This is only possible by way of reaching out far and wide to every music audience, thereby bringing down the cost to almost negligible. Technology shall play a critical role to make this happen.
name: BEATCURRY MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Established with the aim to be a reliable partner to the farmers and producers by providing Sustainable Agricultural protection measures, Shashwat agro solutions is proposed to play a vital role for poison free farming.

Our motto is to enhance productivity, profitability and quality concerns of farmers and producers by providing protection measures with maintaining sustainability of resources. 

Shashwat commits to address these areas with the core of Sustainable solutions – which will be environmentally and economically sustainable and having long term value proposition to all the stake holders. 

Shashwat is also proposed to provide value added services for post-harvest technologies to harness maximum value for producers by creating a valuable supply chain.
name: SHASHWAT AGROSOLUTIONS INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: The Brand Stop is a development stage venture based in Mumbai, offering a website to facilitate the sale of brand-new luxury products. It aims to develop a stock market for goods in a live ‘bid/ask’ market environment. Buyers place bids, sellers place asks, and when a bid and ask meet, the transaction happens automatically. However, The Brand Stop will play a major role in connecting them and verifying that an authentic product reaches the buyer. It is based on the ‘bid/ask’ model of the stock market.
name: The Brand Stop

idea: Plotch is an AI-driven ecommerce ERP for small businesses. Plotch is a fully focused technology platform for online businesses and caters to almost all needs of an eCommerce business. plotch has been designed in a very scalable way using a modular architecture. Using plotch, an eCommerce business can launch a shopping website and app in few minutes or connect to an already existing Shopify or Magento website. It is also the only tech stack available for launching online marketplaces very quickly.
name: Plotch
